meaning_str.bing:
n. 邪恶；罪恶；恶行；弊端
adj. 恶毒的；邪恶的；有害的；道德败坏的
adv. 恶毒地
网络. 魔鬼；恶魔

恶毒的；邪恶的；有害的；道德败坏的

邪恶的；不幸的；恶毒的；有害的；道德败坏的；讨厌的；脾气坏的
邪恶；罪恶；恶行；不幸；灾祸

1.en: For from within, out of men's hearts, come evil thoughts, sexual immorality, theft, murder, adultery.
1.cn: 因为从里面，就是从人心里，发出恶念，苟合。

2.en: I got to sit next to his mother. She evil eyed me the whole time.
2.cn: 我只能跟他妈妈一起坐，他妈妈一直凶巴巴地盯着我。

3.en: But if he had no evil purpose against him, and God gave him into his hand, I will give you a place to which he may go in flight.
3.cn: 但若不是有意杀人，而是天主许他的手行的，我给你指定一个他可以逃避的地方。

0.cn: 汉斯？汉斯！邪恶的双胞胎。

1.en: My aunts said it was an evil fairy.
1.cn: 我的阿姨说，那是一个邪恶的仙女。

2.en: Ninth-century Japan. An evil warlord ruled the land.
2.cn: 9世纪的日本，邪恶的军阀统治了当地。

3.en: How sad is it that my own evil doppelganger was smarter than me?
3.cn: 我邪恶的二重身居然比我聪明，这多可悲啊。

4.en: We feel awful, Larry. Something took hold of us like an evil spell.
4.cn: 我们感觉糟透了，拉瑞。好像有邪恶的魔咒缠着我们！

5.en: I'm intrigued that my friends don't realize that you are an evil genius.
5.cn: 我感兴趣的是我的朋友们居然没发现是你个邪恶的天才。

6.en: I was like the Tin Man, perfectly content until that evil Wizard gave him a heart.
6.cn: 当时的我就像铁皮人，对现状非常满足直到邪恶的巫师给了他一颗心。

7.en: A mark like that only comes from being touched by a curse and an evil cursed at that.
7.cn: 只有接触到魔咒才会留下那样的疤痕，一种邪恶的魔咒。

8.en: Then it gets worse because I told him I would see him tomorrow night. Phoebe! I know! Evil!
8.cn: 然后越来越糟糕，因为我答应他明晚跟他见面。菲比！我知道！邪恶的女人！

9.en: No, not because I cheated. Because I'm an evil genius. And you're just a kid. A stupid kid.
9.cn: 不，不是因为我作弊。是因为我是邪恶的天才，你只是一个孩子，笨小孩。

10.en: They bounced from one evil boss to another. But they never seemed to find their perfect fit.
10.cn: 他们不停更换邪恶的主人，但从未找到一个合适的。

11.en: The name and the address drip with evil. What else do we know about him? Why, quite a bit, actually.
11.cn: 这名字和地址都渗着邪恶的气息。我们还知道什么？还有很多，其实。

12.en: Drake, what are you getting at? I'm not Drake. That's right! He's not Drake. He's Hans Ramoray, Drake's evil twin.
12.cn: 德瑞克，你到底要说什么？我不是德瑞克，没错，他不是德瑞克，他是汉斯雷莫瑞，德瑞克邪恶的双胞胎兄弟。

13.en: People who are evil don't believe those lessons anymore, Riley. They stop thinking the world has anything to teach them.
13.cn: 真正邪恶的人听不进去别人的话，莱丽，他们不再相信这个世界还能教他们。

14.en: I have started my research, and I will continue down this dark journey that I can only call, "Riley Matthews: evil person."
14.cn: 我开始了研究，并且会继续完成这场黑暗的旅行，然后我就可以被说成：莱丽·马修斯，一个邪恶的人。

15.en: Well, pay attention, my evil darling, because I have spent my entire life meeting the world, and I know something about it.
15.cn: 注意了，我邪恶的甜心，我的一生都在探寻这个世界，我还是对世界有点了解的。

16.en: And this is Buzz Light-year, the coolest toy ever! Look, he can fly and shoot lasers. He's sworn to protect the Galaxy from the evil Emperor Zurg.
16.cn: 他是巴斯光年，有史以来最酷的玩具! 看 他会飞，还会发射激光，他发誓要保护银河，不受邪恶的扎克天王侵略。

17.en: It wasn't necessarily they were evil people. Clearly they were doing awful things and they have stolen millions of dollars of old ladies in reality.
17.cn: 他们并不一定就是坏人。虽然他们做了非常邪恶的事情，且现实中的所作所为相当于从老人那儿偷了上百万美金。

18.en: There's a tribe in Papua new Guinea where, when a hunter flaunts his success to the rest of the village, they kill him and drive away evil spirits with a drum made of his skin.
18.cn: 在巴布亚新几内亚有一个部落，当一个猎人向其他部民炫耀他的成功时，他们宰了他，并敲打他的皮做的鼓以驱逐他邪恶的灵魂。

19.en: Now Slinky here, is as loyal as any dog you could want. And Hamm, he'll keep your money safe, but he's also one of the most dastardly villains of all time, Evil Doctor Pork-chop.
19.cn: 这是弹簧狗 他是世界上最忠诚的狗狗。他是火腿，可以帮你保管钱，不过他同时也是最坏的反派角色之一，邪恶的猪排博士。
